The product features former USC player and Heisman Trophy winner Reggie Bush on the cover. While there weren't any stunning new features added to the PS2 and Xbox games, tweaks were added to improve the existing features. The theme for 07 is "Turn the Tide. Like the 2005 version said for home-field advantage, this year's version emphasizes that momentum is more important in college football than any other sport.
